summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Turkish customer visit tracking application. Backend APIs fully functional, frontend working correctly with minor overlay issue on add customer button.

ui_bugs.issue: Emergent badge overlay intercepts click events on add customer navigation button
ui_bugs.workaround: Can navigate to add customer page via customers page
